org.alljoyn.about.client

Interface AboutClient

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ClientBase
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AboutClientImpl

    public interface AboutClient
extends ClientBase
    An interface for retrieval of remote IoE device's About data. Encapsulates the AboutTransport BusInterface

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,Object> getAbout(String languageTag)
      Return all the configuration fields based on the language tag.
      BusObjectDescription[] getBusObjectDescriptions()
      Returns the Bus Interfaces and Bus Objects supported by the device.
      String getDefaultLanguage()
      Get the language that is used for Announcements.
      String[] getLanguages()
      Get the languages that are supported by the device.

      • Methods inherited from interface ClientBase

        connect, disconnect, getPeerName, getSessionId, getVersion, initBus, isConnected

    • Method Detail

      • getDefaultLanguage

        String getDefaultLanguage()
                          throws BusException
        Get the language that is used for Announcements.
        Returns:
        a String representing the language. IETF language tags specified by RFC 5646.
        Throws:
        BusException

      • getLanguages

        String[] getLanguages()
                      throws BusException
        Get the languages that are supported by the device.
        Returns:
        a String array of languages. IETF language tags specified by RFC 5646.
        Throws:
        BusException

      • getAbout

        Map<String,Object> getAbout(String languageTag)
                            throws BusException
        Return all the configuration fields based on the language tag.
        Parameters:
        languageTag - IETF language tags specified by RFC 5646
        Returns:
        All the configuration fields based on the language tag. If language tag is not specified (i.e. ""), fields based on device's default language are returned
        Throws:
        BusException
        See Also:
        AboutKeys

      • getBusObjectDescriptions

        BusObjectDescription[] getBusObjectDescriptions()
                                                throws BusException
        Returns the Bus Interfaces and Bus Objects supported by the device.
        Returns:
        the array of object paths and the list of all interfaces available at the given object path.
        Throws:
        BusException
